column6: It's the best product in ghe market
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2018
column14: It's a must if you have gray hair. It's the best product in ghe market. I used this shampoo for more than 10 years and my color is fantastic.  I highly recommend it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2021
column14: I just received this set. Inside the plastic wrap was an absolute mess. Both bottles had a broken cap which allowed some of their contents to ooze out into the wrap. What a mess! I don't know how much is missing but I am not a happy camper.
